TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEditableCollectionView

summary.span: 定义 所实现的方法和属性，用于向集合提供编辑功能。

span.span: Defines methods and properties that a implements to provide editing capabilities to a collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当集合视图实现接口，您可以直接更改基础集合中，如果这样，要使用的方法和属性进行更改的公开，而不考虑该集合的类型。When a collection view implements the interface, you can directly change the underlying collection, if it allows changes to be made, by using the methods and properties that exposes, regardless of the collection's type. 类型， ，并是类型随[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]继承自。The types , , and are the types that ship with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] that inherit from . 这些类型还实现，因此您可以编辑使用这些类型之一的集合。These types also implement the , so you can edit a collection that uses one of those types. 具体而言，通常使用由于属性是。, in particular, is often used because the property is an . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过使用定义的方法向集合添加项。The following example shows how to add an item to a collection by using methods that are defined by . 此应用程序显示销售的项的列表，并为用户提供添加、 编辑或删除某一项的选项。This application displays a list of items for sale and gives the user the option of adding, editing, or removing an item. 当用户添加或编辑一个项时，表单将提示用户输入新项。When the user adds or edits an item, a form prompts the user to enter a new item. 如果用户提交窗体，在项已提交到的集合。If the user submits the form, the item is committed to the collection. 如果用户取消窗体，则会丢弃该项。If the user cancels the form, the item is discarded. 有关完整的示例，请参阅[更改集合使用 IEditableCollectionView 示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). [!code-csharp[EditingCollectionsSnippets#AddItem](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#additem)] [!code-vb[EditingCollectionsSnippets#AddItem](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#additem)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object AddNew() cil managed

span.span: Adds a new item to the collection.
The new item that is added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用开始添加事务。Calling begins an add transaction. 应调用或结束添加事务。You should call or to end the add transaction. 始终在集合视图中将出现一个新项。A new item always appears in the collection view. 任何筛选、 排序或分组操作也将应用于视图应用于新项时调用。Any filtering, sorting, or grouping that is applied to the view is applied to the new item when is called. ## Examples 下面的示例创建，会提示用户添加新项。The following example creates a that prompts the user to add a new item. 然后，调用若要创建新对象并设置的对该对象。Then it calls to create a new object and sets the of the to that object. 有关完整的示例，请参阅[更改集合使用 IEditableCollectionView 示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). [!code-csharp[EditingCollectionsSnippets#AddItem](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#additem)] [!code-vb[EditingCollectionsSnippets#AddItem](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#additem)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanAddNew As Boolean
public: property bool CanAddNew { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以将新项添加到集合中。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a new item can be added to the collection.

value.span: 如果可以将新项添加到集合中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a new item can be added to the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以添加新项，如果满足以下条件：An can add a new item if the following are true: - 可以将项添加到基础集合。An item can be added to the underlying collection. 例如，如果集合是只读的是`false`。For example, if the collection is read-only, is `false`. - 可以创建一个对象集合中的类型。The can create an object of the type that is in the collection. 例如，如果集合的类型，则必须能够创建类型的对象`T`。For example, if the collection is of type , the must be able to create an object of type `T`. ## Examples 以下示例检查是否可以将项添加到集合。The following example checks whether an item can be added to the collection. 如果是`false`，该示例将向该用户不能添加项。If is `false`, the example tells the user that an item cannot be added. 否则，它会显示提示用户添加新项的窗体。Otherwise, it shows a form that prompts the user to add a new item. 有关完整的示例，请参阅[更改集合使用 IEditableCollectionView 示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections) . [!code-csharp[EditingCollectionsSnippets#AddItem](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#additem)] [!code-vb[EditingCollectionsSnippets#AddItem](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#additem)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CanCancelEdit As Boolean
public: property bool CanCancelEdit { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示集合视图是否可以放弃挂起的更改并还原所编辑对象的原始值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object.

value.span: 如果集合视图可以放弃挂起的更改并还原所编辑对象的原始值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the collection view can discard pending changes and restore the original values of an edited object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是`true`视图是否支持当前正在编辑的项上的"挂起的更改"这一概念。 is `true` if the view supports the notion of "pending changes" on the currently edited item. 例如，可能会返回一个集合视图`true`如果已编辑的项实现，视图是否具有可用于回滚的项的状态信息或备份的更改。For example, a collection view might return `true` if the edited item implements , or if the view has information about the item's state that it can use to roll back changes. 是`false`如果视图不能还原上一个对象的更改。 is `false` if the view cannot revert changes on an object. 在这种情况下，调用以使视图若要退出编辑状态，并提供逻辑来还原已编辑的对象上的更改。In that case, call to cause the view to exit the edit state and provide logic to revert the changes on the object that was edited. ## Examples 下面的示例获取检查调用之前，是否可以还原所编辑的项的原始值。The following example gets to check whether the original values of the edited item can be restored before it calls . 如果不能还原值，则必须提供其他逻辑来执行此操作。If the values cannot be restored, you must supply additional logic to do so. 如果它们可以是这些值将还原时，此示例调用。If they can be, the values are restored when the example calls . 有关完整的示例，请参阅[更改集合使用 IEditableCollectionView 示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). [!code-csharp[EditingCollectionsSnippets#CancelEdit](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#canceledit)] [!code-vb[EditingCollectionsSnippets#CancelEdit](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#canceledit)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CancelEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 结束编辑事务，并还原项的原始值（如有可能）。

span.span: Ends the edit transaction and, if possible, restores the original value to the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置到`null`并导致要退出编辑状态的集合视图。 sets to `null` and causes the collection view to exit the edit state. 如果是`true`，还还原所编辑对象的原始值。If is `true`, also restores the original values of the edited object. ## Examples 下面的示例获取检查调用之前，是否可以还原所编辑的项的原始值。The following example gets to check whether the original values of the edited item can be restored before it calls . 如果不能还原值，则必须提供其他逻辑来执行此操作。If the values cannot be restored, you must supply additional logic to do so. 如果它们可以是这些值将还原时，此示例调用。If they can be, the values are restored when the example calls . 有关完整的示例，请参阅[更改集合使用 IEditableCollectionView 示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). [!code-csharp[EditingCollectionsSnippets#CancelEdit](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#canceledit)] [!code-vb[EditingCollectionsSnippets#CancelEdit](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#canceledit)]

summary.span: 结束添加事务并放弃挂起的新项。

span.span: Ends the add transaction and discards the pending new item.

remarks.format: ## Examples 以下示例显示提示用户添加新项的窗体。The following example displays a form that prompts the user to add a new item. 如果用户提交窗体，该示例将调用将该项添加到集合。If the user submits the form, the example calls to add the item to the collection. 如果用户取消窗体，该示例将调用以丢弃该项。If the user cancels the form, the example calls to discard the item. 有关完整的示例，请参阅[更改集合使用 IEditableCollectionView 示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). span.span: if an item can be removed from the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是`false`如果基础集合是只读的。 is `false` if the underlying collection is read-only. ## Examples 下面的示例调用来检查是否可以从集合中移除项。The following example calls to check whether an item can be removed from the collection. 如果可以移除项，该示例提示用户确认操作并调用如果用户单击**是**。If an item can be removed, the example prompts the user to confirm the action and calls if the user clicks **Yes**. 有关完整的示例，请参阅[更改集合使用 IEditableCollectionView 示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). summary.span: 结束编辑事务并保存挂起的更改。

span.span: Ends the edit transaction and saves the pending changes.

remarks.format: ## Examples 以下示例创建一个表单，提示用户编辑现有项。The following example creates a form that prompts the user to edit an existing item. 如果用户提交窗体，该示例将调用若要将所做的更改保存到集合。If the user submits the form, the example calls to save the changes to the collection. 如果用户取消窗体，该示例将调用放弃所做的更改。If the user cancels the form, the example calls to discard the changes. 有关完整的示例，请参阅[更改集合使用 IEditableCollectionView 示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). remarks.format: ## Examples 以下示例创建一个表单，提示用户编辑现有项。The following example creates a form that prompts the user to edit an existing item. 如果用户提交窗体，所做的更改将提交到的集合。If the user submits the form, the changes are committed to the collection. 如果用户取消窗体，则放弃所做的更改。If the user cancels the form, the changes are discarded. 有关完整的示例，请参阅[更改集合使用 IEditableCollectionView 示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections) . MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Remove(object item) cil managed

span.span: The item to remove.

summary.span: 从集合中移除指定的项。

span.span: Removes the specified item from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`item`不在集合中不执行任何操作。If `item` is not in the collection, does nothing. ## Examples 下面的示例调用来检查是否可以从集合中移除项。The following example calls to check whether an item can be removed from the collection. 如果可以移除项，该示例提示用户确认操作并调用如果用户单击**是**。If an item can be removed, the example prompts the user to confirm the action and calls if the user clicks **Yes**. 有关完整的示例，请参阅[更改集合使用 IEditableCollectionView 示例](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections)。For the entire sample, see [Changing a Collection by Using IEditableCollectionView Sample](https://github.com/Microsoft/WPF-Samples/tree/master/Data%20Binding/EditingCollections). [!code-csharp[EditingCollectionsSnippets#RemoveItem](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#removeitem)] [!code-vb[EditingCollectionsSnippets#RemoveItem](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EditingCollectionsSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#removeitem)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveAt(int32 index) cil managed

span.span: The position of the item to remove.

summary.span: 从集合中删除指定位置的项。

span.span: Removes the item at the specified position from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `index` 是相对于集合视图，而不是集合。`index` is relative to the collection view, not the collection. 例如，如果该集合具有 10 个项，并且视图有，以便显示 7 项，有效值的`index`为 0 到 6。For example, if the collection has 10 items and the view has a so that 7 items appear, the valid values of `index` are 0 through 6.

exception.span: 小于 0 或大于集合视图中的项数。

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than the number of items in the collection view.
